price: Kae εberε a wo Wura Nyankopͻn frεε Mose (ka kyerεε no) sε: “Kͻ amanfoͻ abͻneεfoͻ no hͻ, --
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani i'ti al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
